overview: When her 3-year-old son drowns in a friendâ€™s backyard pool, director Chezik Tsunoda goes on a heartbreaking but, ultimately, healing journey to connect with parents who have experienced similar tragedies. Searching for answers, she finds hope in the work of other parents and activists to make a difference in this preventable tragedy.
tagline: A mother's mission to prevent childhood drowning.
title: Drowning in Silence
